1.title: Tote'n' & Gloat'n
1.plot: Jim has a chance to buy a classically curvy farm truck: a 1958 Chevy Apache. Can he rescue it from the rainy fields and fix it up, or will this old workhorse be put out to pasture? And when the boys convince him to 'borrow' an engine from his wife's prized Chevelle for another project, he quickly finds himself paying the price.

2.title: Tribute Car
2.plot: Jim purchases a '65 Mustang Coupe owned by a dear friends late daughter and decides to make it a Tribute car in her honor, but when the guys discover a mass of hidden rust they struggle to avoid a major flipping-flop. And when Jason's daughter gets her learners permit, he has to buckle up and teach her the rules of the road.

3.title: Boulevard Bruising
3.plot: Jim and Jason attempt to transform a '71 Cutlass into a street-eating hot rod, but can Jim look past the booger-green beast to reveal the beauty beneath? Meanwhile, Carol challenges the entire family to a race to defend her title as the fastest Eli, but things quickly spin out of control.

4.title: Jacked Up
4.plot: Jason wants to go big when they buy a '76 Chevy Scottsdale. Can they flip this classic pickup from the farmer's field and reap its plentiful bounty or will this project sink in the mud?Meanwhile Jim searches desperately to replace the motor they 'borrowed' from his wife's Chevelle; because if he can't replace it, she might replace him.

5.title: Cowboy Corvette
5.plot: When Jim takes his grandson Jimmy on his first pick, they have a chance to buy a 1982 C3 Corvette. Can they close the deal on this classic and give it the massive power upgrade it needs under the hood?Then the Eli boys venture back to 1882 for a Cowboy Action shootout to prove who's the best of the best, in a vest, from the West.

6.title: School of Mach
6.plot: Things get spicy when Jim buys a '69 Mustang Mach-1from a boneyard with no motor. Can the boys come through in the clutch and find a 351 Windsor, or will this flip stall out? And things really heat up when Jason challenges his baby-brother Josh to a chili pepper eating contest to determine wheel-picking rights.

7.title: Rocky Mountain Beetle
7.plot: After Jason convinces Jim to buy a 1999 VW Beetle, the boys decide to have a little fun outside the box. Can they flip this commuter bug into the Rocky Mountain Beetle it was destined to be or will this off-road project go off the rails?Then Carol finally gets her big block 454 and some sweet swift justice.

8.title: Ghosted
8.plot: The Eli's are caught hook, line and sinker when they find a 1980 Camaro complete with T-Tops and a big block 396. Can they catch, flip and release this monster muscle car or will they hang on too long and end up underwater?Then it's time for some family fishing, so they may end up underwater either way.
